mapper.insert: insert into BOARD_TB (title, content, writer) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.select: select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt from BOARD_TB where bno = #{bno}
mapper.update: update BOARD_TB set title=#{title}, content=#{content} where bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt from BOARD_TB where bno > 0 order by bno desc, regdate desc
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM (SELECT * FROM BOARD_TB ORDER BY bno desc, regdate desc) A WHERE ROWNUM <= 10) WHERE RNUM > 0

SELECT bno, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, bno, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt FROM ( SELECT bno, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt FROM BOARD_TB WHERE bno > 0 ORDER BY bno DESC, regdate DESC ) ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{pageStart} AND #{perPageNum} + #{pageStart} - 1
SELECT count(bno) FROM BOARD_TB WHERE bno > 0
